head_office_address: EUACA c/o Brussels Slot Coordination (BSC) New Terminal, 4th Floor, TMA 530

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Observatory on Airport Capacity & Quality#E01111#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1111#Member#C#Task Force on delays to air transport in Europe
goals__remit: Contribute to efficient solutions to optimise the use of capacity at Airports in Europe, promote a professional, neutral, transparent, non-discriminatory service to the aviation industry, be an independent not-for-profit association, act as the interest group of voluntary members of independent coordinators and facilitators, that is recognised for its expertise, ensure the delivery of an excellent customer oriented service, share and develop comprehensive professional knowledge and information among all our members.
